profile.headline: Software Engineer Intern at Live Stack

employments.summary:
●   Built tests and product features for event-hosting platform using Javascript, React, Express, PostgreSQL.
●   Wrote unit and integration tests to guide component refactor using React Testing-Library and Jest.
●   Refactored complex React component into modular, testable, maintainable components
●   Added activity feed feature using the Sockets protocol to send server-initiated transfers with Socket.io.

●   Triaged incoming genetic samples according to test type and patient medical history.
●   Optimized quality control flow by migrating Salesforce reports and documentation into Tableau dashboards.
●   Served as a stakeholder to implement analytics software used to understand healthcare providers usage.

employments.company: Action & Consciousness Lab, San Francisco State University
employments.summary:
Conducted behavioral experiments in a cognitive psychology laboratory by designing experimental
protocols, analyzing data with R, and preparing manuscripts for journal submission.

employments.company: Action & Consciousness Lab, San Francisco State University
employments.summary:
●   Conducted literature reviews and research regarding food and housing insecurity amongst students in the public university systems in California that supported the creation of SF State's Basic Needs Initiative
●   Evaluated student needs on behalf the health center's programming board by reviewing existing research
and university programs, conducting group interviews, and analyzing data for themes and insights.

Provided IT support during office and server room relocations with technical documentation, hardware
installation, and trouble-shooting network, software, hardware issues on Windows and Mac OS systems.

educations.degree: 31 of 34 units completed towards a Masters in Psychology
